tool_description: Generates detailed visual comparisons between candidate species and observed bird features to aid final identification.

comparison_focus.description: Specific features to emphasize in comparison

difficulty_level.description: Comparison detail level: basic, intermediate, advanced

error_messages: Insufficient candidates: Provide 2-10 species for meaningful comparison.
No observed features: Include at least one visual feature for comparison.
Too many features: Limit observed_features to 20 items.
Invalid difficulty level: Use one of [basic, intermediate, advanced].
Species not found: One or more candidate species not in database.
usage: Input candidate_species from database query and observed_features from image analysis. Optionally specify comparison_focus and difficulty_level for targeted comparison.

species_comparisons.description: Detailed comparison text for each species

similarity_rankings.description: Visual similarity scores for each candidate (0-100)

distinguishing_features.description: Key features that separate similar species

best_match.description: Highest-ranking species based on visual comparison
